items.sentence: The game had already started by the time we got to the stadium.
I'm going to buy one of these. I think you should buy one, too.
You're really tired, aren't you? You should go straight to bed.
Tom ate a couple of slices of bread and drank a glass of water.
Tom wanted to buy a pickup truck, but he ended up buying a van.
I bought this piece of property, hoping to build a house on it.
If I'd had a little more money, I could've bought a better one.
We caught a glimpse of the castle from the window of our train.
We'll also have to create a separate smoking section, won't we?
I don't think that Tom will ever get over the loss of his wife.
